description:
The funnyman, who revealed this weekend that he is selling his £8million F1 Maclaren supercar, will revive the slapstick character once again in order to support the charity.在这周末宣称800万英镑卖掉自己的F1Maclaren跑车的喜剧演员罗温艾金森，为参加慈善活动，会再次复活“憨豆先生”这一喜剧形象。

Mr Bean's last outing was seen by millions of people around the world when he took part in the London 2012 opening ceremony.憨豆先生上次出现在世界观众的面前是2012年伦敦奥运开幕式的时候。

His return comes alongside a comeback for Dawn French as The Vicar Of Dibley.和他这次一起复出的还有主演过《蒂博雷的牧师》的英国喜剧女演员唐·弗兰奇。

She will also appear in a one-off special, to be screened on Red Nose Day, March 13, and this time around the unstoppable Geraldine Granger will be campaigning to become a Bishop.唐•弗兰奇也同样会在定于3月13日的“红鼻子日”播出的特别剧集里出现，这一次无人能阻挡的杰拉尔丁·格兰杰（唐•弗兰奇在《蒂博雷的牧师》所饰演的角色名字）将会参加竞选成为一名主教。

Other TV treats will include another Great Comic Relief Bake Off in which 16 celebrity bakers will be put through their paces by Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood. The contestants will include Jonathan Ross, Abbey Clancy and Gok Wan.还有另外一部剧集叫《烘焙家》，其中由玛丽·贝瑞和保罗·霍利伍德来测试16位明星烘焙师的能力。参加的明星包括乔纳森·罗斯、阿比·克兰茜以及古克·温等。

Strictly host Claudia Winkleman will encourage the rest of the nation to take part in the first ever Comic Relief Danceathon on Sunday, March 8.严格的主持人克劳蒂亚·温克曼将会带领大家一起参与于3月8日周六Comic Relief首次举行的舞蹈马拉松活动。

The six hour frenzy will take place at Wembley Arena, London and other locations across the country.这个长达六个小时的狂欢活动将会在温布利体育场、伦敦及英国的其他地区举行。

And X Factor presenter Dermot O'Leary will also do his bit to raise cash for the cause – he has agreed to a challenge known as Dermot's Day of Dance, which will see him undertake an exhausting 24-hour non-stop dance marathon. 《X音素》的主持人德莫特·奥利里也会出现在本次慈善活动中，因为他已经同意挑战舞蹈马拉松，届时我们将会看到他24小时不间断跳舞的样子。

title: 憨豆先生重返荧幕 3月迎来特别剧集
